How to use the license

This article only applies to Dynamic Web TWAIN version 9.0 and above. For older versions, you need to generate a LPK file . Below are steps on how to generate a product key with your license(s).

Steps

  1. Make sure you have installed Dynamic Web TWAIN 9.0 or above.
  2. Open Licensing Tool which typically can be found in the Start Menu or at 
    C:\Program Files (x86)\Dynamsoft\Dynamic Web TWAIN SDK {version number} {Trial}\DWTLicensing.exe
  3. Enter your licenses in the Licensing Tool (delete the old ones if necessary):

  4. Press the button "Generate Key" to generate the product key based on your licenses:

  5. Lastly, assign the product key at runtime to the property ProductKey . Please make sure this is done before you use any other APIs of the product 
    DWObject.ProductKey = "E0F5B6F0974EB8F926083A8A05A9F0B66C48DB19EFE2AFF972DBDAF3F0A***";

Contact us

If you are still having difficulty integrating Dynamic Web TWAIN into your application, please contact us at live chat or call us at 1-604-605-5491 for instant tech support.
